entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
